channel.title: Posts on thinking village
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on thinking village

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Hello form the other side. First of all, let me introduce a bit about myself. I, a human living on earth, usually have a conversation like this:

  • me: bla… bla… bla..
  • most people: Don’t think too much!

Yes, I do think a lots.
